events.name: OnItemChanged
events.description: Event fired every time the focused item on the carousel changes.

methods.description: Adds the Image Carousel to the screen and initializes it with the indicated list.
methods.name: Build

methods.description:
Notifies Carousel that the list it was initialized with has changed (items were added or removed).

> If the list is a global variable, it is preferable to always work on that same list, that is, modify it by adding or removing items, but not by replacing the value of the variable with a new list.
methods.name: NotifyDataUpdate
Stop
methods.description: For an Image Carousel with the 'AutoPlay' option, this block pauses the automatic switching of images.

methods.name: Play
methods.description: For an Image Carousel with the 'AutoPlay' option, this block resumes the automatic switching of images.

methods.name: IsPlaying
methods.description:
For an Image Carousel with the 'AutoPlay' option, this block returns true or false depending on the state of the autoplay.

> Useful for working with 'Play' and 'Stop' blocks

methods.name: Next
methods.description: This block changes the focused item to the next one, by smooth scrolling to the next position.

methods.name: Previous
methods.description: This block changes the focused item to the previous one, by smooth scrolling to the previous position.

methods.name: GoToPosition
methods.description: This block changes the focused item to the item at the indicated position, if the **smooth** option is *True* then it will perform a smooth (animated) scroll to the position, if *False* then it will quickly change without any animation.

methods.name: ImageWidthByCount
methods.description:
This block calculates a width for each image, depending on the size of the **container** (where the Carousel is located) and the number of items you want to display.

> **Offset**: It is an extra size that will be added to the calculated result.
> Leave it at 0 if it is to be ignored.

methods.name: ImageWidthByPercent
methods.description: This block calculates a width for each image, depending on the size of the **container** (where the Carousel is located) and a **percentage** (relative to the container.)

properties.name: Width
properties.description: Sets the width of the Carousel.

properties.name: Height
properties.description: Sets the height of the Carousel.

group.title: Image Carousel
group.description:
This extension provides a widget that allows you to create a horizontal carousel of images. It has several features, such as automatic playback (switch to next image).
In addition, it includes several interface features that can be edited.

Some features:

* Animation of scaling when changing images.
* Autoplay.
* Image scaling (**Centered** and **Adjusted**).
* Endless mode, the same images will be repeated over and over again.
group.shortDescription: Widget that allows you to create a horizontal carousel of images.
